title: The Starlight Ball (Sugar Hill Book 4)
features: Avery Dufresne defeated the spirit of Ambrose, but there are other ghosts lurking in the halls of Sugar Hill. As the Dufresne family prepares for the Starlight Ball, Summer and Avery notice an uptick in supernatural activity. With the help of Jessica from My Haunted Plantation, they uncover their own connection to a yet-untold family secret and seek to break the spell that binds them all to a dangerous fate. The Starlight Ball is Book Four in the Sugar Hill series by M.L. Bullock.Books in the Sugar Hill series:Wife of the Left HandFire on the RampartsBlood by CandlelightThe Starlight Ball His Lovely GardenRead more series from M.L. author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/odk69510s59qdnr76ac15c63cp._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'M.L. Bullock', 'about': ['Author of the best-selling Seven Sisters series, M.L. Bullock has been storytelling since she was a child. In fact, she was a quite an excellent liar and decided early on that she’d rather live in her own head than the real world. Born in Antigua, British West Indies, she has had a lifelong love affair with haunted houses, lonesome beaches and forgotten places. She currently lives on the Gulf Coast and regularly haunts her favorite hangout, Dauphin Island and downtown Mobile. A visit to Historic Oakleigh House in Mobile, Alabama inspired her successful supernatural suspense Seven Sisters series.', 'Follow M. L.
